XPEL Technologies Corp acquires Canadian 
								company


								7/4/2007

  Breaking News....... XPEL Tech Acquires Shadow Tinting ( TSXV:DAP.U) Call Your Broker For More Information


  










Jul 04, 
								2007 (M2 EQUITYBITES via COMTEX News 

Network) 
								-- 

								XPEL Technologies Corp (TSXV:DAP.U), which 
								specialises in the electronic delivery of 

automotive 
								aftermarket products, confirmed on 3 July that 
								it has completed the purchase of all of the 
								issued and outstanding shares of Shadow Tinting 
								Ltd and 1290801 Alberta Ltd, of Calgary, 
								Alberta, Canada ("Shadow"). 

								Shadow is involved in paint protection and 
								window tint film training, installation and 
								distribution. The company, which serves western 
								Canada, was founded in 1999 by owner operator 
								Nuno Ferreira. Ferreira will remain with the
								

business 
								as president of the wholly-owned Canadian XPEL 
								subsidiary. 

								The purchase price consists of a combination of 
								cash and common 

shares 
								of XPEL along with common share purchase 
								warrants, payable in part based on certain 
								performance criteria. The number of issued and 
								outstanding listed shares of the company 
								following completion of the transaction is 
								23,649,355, XPEL said. 
The TSXV 
								has not reviewed and does not accept 
								responsibility for the adequacy and accuracy of 
								this information.
